name: Fear and loathing in Las Vegas

content.en: “Many fine books have been written in prison.”
A natural street freak, just eating whatever came by.”
A waitress with the appearance of a very old hooker who has finally found her place in life
An ominous assignment -- with overtones of extreme personal danger.
Ignoring that nightmare in the bathroom.
The hazy line between masochism and madness.
Two women fucking a polar bear
Be quiet, be calm... name, rank, and ______, nothing else...
But our trip was different. It was a classic affirmation of everything right and true and decent in the national character. A gross, physical salute to the fantastic possibilities of ______.
Consciousness Expansion” went out with LBJ … and it is worth noting, historically, that ______ came in with Nixon.”
Every now and then when your life gets complicated and the weasels start closing in, the only real cure is ______.
In a closed society where everybody's guilty, the only crime is ______.
In a world of thieves, the only final sin is ______.
Journalism is not a profession or a trade. It is a cheap catch-all for fuckoffs and misfits—a false doorway to ______.
Shortly before my murder, I was still vaguely haunted by our hitchhiker’s remark about ______.
______ is what the whole hep world would be doing on Saturday night if the Nazis had won the war.
